Module module2023s1.assignment2
Package lms.logistics.belts

Class Splitter

Object
Transport
Splitter
All Implemented Interfaces:
GridComponent, Tickable
public class Splitter extends Transport
Provides an object to handle alternate pathways for nodes that Split. Extends transport and overrides getPath(), getEncoding() and setInput().
See Also:
  • for more details
This code is provided to assist you in assignment 2

      Sets the alternative path value where a node splits
      Parameters:
      output - Path for the next node

    • getPath

      public Path getPath()
      Returns the next Path object to follow in a sequence. This method will alternate between the default path and an alternate path, returning the first path on the first call and the alternate path on the second call, then switch back to the default path on the third call, and so on.
      Overrides:
      getPath in class Transport
      Returns:
      the next Path object in the sequence
